protein.specific_function: Modulator of polycomb-mediated repression, which can be activated either by ERK, p38 and JNK. Substrate of CSBP. In vitro, phosphorylates HSPB1, BMI1/PCGF4 and TCF3

reference.reference_text: McLaughlin MM, Kumar S, McDonnell PC, Van Horn S, Lee JC, Livi GP, Young PR: Identification of mitogen-activated protein (MAP) kinase-activated protein kinase-3, a novel substrate of CSBP p38 MAP kinase. J Biol Chem. 1996 Apr 5;271(14):8488-92.
